WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this is fixed in the develop branch and should be part of the next release.
WorkItem.Description:
I am not sure if the definitions are bugged or if the compiler itself has still some issues with recursive definitions. The bug appears by only referencing the definitions of sugar.js.

These are the definitions
https://github.com/jbaldwin/sugar.d.ts

And this is the error:


    /usr/local/lib/node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc.js:0
    (function (exports, require, module, __filename, __dirname) { /*! ************
    ^
    RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded

tsc version: 0.9.1.1
node version: v0.10.20
System Version: OS X 10.9 (13A603)
Kernel Version: Darwin 13.0.0
